answers.answer: Why don't you want to go to the doctor?  Even if it was legal or possible to get a prescription drug on the Internet, wouldn't you be concerned that self-medicating might have dangerous results?  I haven't taken Clomid for a while, but seem to remember that a lot of monitoring went with it -- ovarian hyperstimulation syndrome might result, and maybe there are other complications that can result also.
i really was just trying to save money....but u are right the risk is of complication is not worth it....Thanks for being honest. I

question: okay i really want to have a baby and i'v been trying for a year. i recently found out i had diabetes and sometime before my periods started coming irregular. So anyway was thinking about trying the drug clomid and i dont want to go to the doctor though. i want to order the drugs off the internet and really wanted to know someone's opinion on this and if anyone knew any legitimate websites that are safe....all opinions are welcome...............
title: i want to have a baby now
